Name: Great Ball of Fire
About the game: In a quiet night, our hero sleeps after a long day of hard work. But, abruptly, a mob of evil birds fiercely invaded his house! Now, our blue hero needs to turn into fire in order to get rid of the nasty birds! Great Ball of Fire is a platform/ puzzle game developed by Drink Cash, a team of two twin brothers. Daniel Noronha ( design and coding) and Gabriel Noronha ( soundtrack). We live in Bauru, SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil. There are 4 worlds with 15 levels each, In each level you need to beat all the birds in the level and collect a key, in order to get out of the room. Picking at least 10 keys is enough to be able to enter the boss room. Have fun and screw these birds! :)
